title: 今年三大Chem grad , 面臨乞食，讀唔讀second degree engine (ME或者EE) 好

replies.msg: 本身已經有poly msc in operation research and risk analysis offer ， 裹面有讀stat , finance , modelling ，仲可以考精算牌，但驚讀完都黑食

quote.msg: 本身已經有poly msc in operation research and risk analysis offer ， 裹面有讀stat , finance , modelling ，仲可以考精算牌，但驚讀完都黑食

replies.msg: Stat + finance + computer science 一定唔乞食

本身已經有poly msc in operation research and risk analysis offer ， 裹面有讀stat , finance , modelling ，仲可以考精算牌，但驚讀完都黑食
讀完ME都係乞食

replies.msg: 讀Engine master 都未必有太大作用，HKIE 淨係認 undergraduate 個degree, 你讀完master 都行唔Scheme A,  基本上所有GE ge post 都唔洗諗，最多只可以做AE 再試下 chart IMechE.

quote.msg: 本身已經有poly msc in operation research and risk analysis offer ， 裹面有讀stat , finance , modelling ，仲可以考精算牌，但驚讀完都黑食
讀完ME都係乞食
讀Engine master 都未必有太大作用，HKIE 淨係認 undergraduate 個degree, 你讀完master 都行唔Scheme A,  基本上所有GE ge post 都唔洗諗，最多只可以做AE 再試下 chart IMechE.
讀完ME都係乞食
讀Engine master 都未必有太大作用，HKIE 淨係認 undergraduate 個degree, 你讀完master 都行唔Scheme A,  基本上所有GE ge post 都唔洗諗，最多只可以做AE 再試下 chart IMechE.
介唔介意share imeche考牌requirement?

replies.msg:
我都唔係話太熟，我自己本身都係行scheme A, 我公司d 人都係chart IMechE同CIBSE多。官網度就咁話有足夠經驗 + HK degree 就報得。不過都係prefer 你有master.
聽佢地講，Chart IMechE都係要你寫personal statement, report 果d再搵兩個CENG簽。仲要講你係公司做咩post，個Organization chart 係點。之後interview會問你平時點 handle d project, 點tackle d problem, 要你用IMechE 果d objective 去答返。

quote.msg: 讀Engine master 都未必有太大作用，HKIE 淨係認 undergraduate 個degree, 你讀完master 都行唔Scheme A,  基本上所有GE ge post 都唔洗諗，最多只可以做AE 再試下 chart IMechE.
介唔介意share imeche考牌requirement?

我都唔係話太熟，我自己本身都係行scheme A, 我公司d 人都係chart IMechE同CIBSE多。官網度就咁話有足夠經驗 + HK degree 就報得。不過都係prefer 你有master.
聽佢地講，Chart IMechE都係要你寫personal statement, report 果d再搵兩個CENG簽。仲要講你係公司做咩post，個Organization chart 係點。之後interview會問你平時點 handle d project, 點tackle d problem, 要你用IMechE 果d objective 去答返。

replies.msg:
imeche應該唔關bs事?
imeche同邊d stream會大關係d?
例如 manufacturing, maintenance, machinery

quote.msg: 本身已經有poly msc in operation research and risk analysis offer ， 裹面有讀stat , finance , modelling ，仲可以考精算牌，但驚讀完都黑食
讀完ME都係乞食
讀Engine master 都未必有太大作用，HKIE 淨係認 undergraduate 個degree, 你讀完master 都行唔Scheme A,  基本上所有GE ge post 都唔洗諗，最多只可以做AE 再試下 chart IMechE.

replies.msg:
其實而家有polyu msc in operation research and risk analysis offer , course list 如下， 但驚讀完都係黑食， 想問讀呢個好定讀second degree engine (ME/ EE)好， poly master 讀1年半，second degree engine 讀兩年半

Polyu msc in operation research and risk analysis Compulsory :
Operation research methods
Advanced operation research methods
Probability and stochastic models ( SOA related :exam P)
Principle of risk analysis
Simulation and risk analysis
Business forecasting
Financial modelling

Elective course( at least 3 course , can be more than 3)

Optimization methods
Scheduling
Statistical inference
Scientific computing
Mathematics of finance (soa related: exam FM)
Investment science (soa related: exam MFE
Mathematics of derivative pricing (soa related :exam MFE)
Loss model
Multi criteria optimization
Risk analysis of epidemics
Statistical data mining
Stochastic optimization
Supply chain analysis
Principle of coporate finance
Coporate risk management
Economics for financial analysis
Supply chain management

quote.msg: 介唔介意share imeche考牌requirement?

我都唔係話太熟，我自己本身都係行scheme A, 我公司d 人都係chart IMechE同CIBSE多。官網度就咁話有足夠經驗 + HK degree 就報得。不過都係prefer 你有master.
聽佢地講，Chart IMechE都係要你寫personal statement, report 果d再搵兩個CENG簽。仲要講你係公司做咩post，個Organization chart 係點。之後interview會問你平時點 handle d project, 點tackle d problem, 要你用IMechE 果d objective 去答返。

imeche應該唔關bs事?
imeche同邊d stream會大關係d?
例如 manufacturing, maintenance, machinery

replies.msg:
上面果d應該全部都得，只要你係report度寫到同mechanical engineering ge關係就ok。
我有同學 做污水處理ge, 做Electrical ge， 做lift ge一樣chart到 IMechE. 當然佢地都係有ME degree.

聽佢地講，Chart IMechE都係要你寫personal statement, report 果d再搵兩個CENG簽。仲要講你係公司做咩post，個Organization chart 係點。之後interview會問你平時點 handle d project, 點tackle d problem, 要你用IMechE 果d objective 去答返。

我有同學 做污水處理ge, 做Electrical ge， 做lift ge一樣chart到 IMechE. 當然佢地都係有ME degree.

replies.msg:
多謝你解答
佢地有行scheme嗎?

replies.msg:
好想講粗口
你本身乞食係人都知
但係你到底對邊樣野有興趣? 兩樣野工作性質都好唔同
唔好覺得都係計下數就岩你
你想做邊樣咪讀邊樣
讀得好就唔會乞食, 讀唔好屎都冇得你食
